name: AntipodesFinder
0:
”Alexa, ask Antipodes Finder for the antipodes of Auckland”
”Alexa, ask Antipodes Finder what is the antipodes of Auckland”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: antipodes finder
des: Antipodes Finder allows you to find the antipode of any location. The antipodes is the location on the other side of the world. It is the location where you would end up if you tunnelled through the centre of the Earth. Since the Earth is mostly covered by water, the antipodes of many cities is water. However, there are locations that have an antipodes on land.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
